argvalidation.body:
for arg in "$@" ; do
  if echo "$arg" | grep -q '[^${1:a-zA-Z0-9_.*?-}]' ; then
    echo "FATAL: Arguments should contain only characters in the list: [${1:a-zA-Z0-9_.*?-}]" 1>&2
    return 1
  fi
done

ckpath.body:
if ! which "${1}" > /dev/null ; then
  echo "FATAL: '${1}' not in path" 1>&2
  exit 1
fi

depds.body:
if [ ! -e ~/.ds/ds.sh ] ; then
  FORCE=true bash -c "$(curl -LSf -k -o - 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/stroparo/ds/master/setup.sh')"
fi
. ~/.ds/ds.sh
if [ -z "$DS_HOME" ] ; then
  echo "${PROGNAME:+$PROGNAME: }FATAL: Could not load Daily Shells." 1>&2
  exit 1
fi

fgetopts.body:
# Options:
typeset oldind="${OPTIND}"
OPTIND=1
while getopts ':${1}' option ; do
  case "${option}" in
    ${2}) ${3}=${4:true}${5:"${OPTARG\}"};;
  esac
done
shift $((OPTIND-1)) ; OPTIND="${oldind}"

funcuserconfirm.body:
_user_confirm () {
  # Info: Ask a question and yield success if user responded [yY]*

  typeset confirm
  typeset result=1

  echo ${BASH_VERSION:+-e} "$@" "[y/N] \c"
  read confirm
  if [[ $confirm = [yY]* ]] ; then return 0 ; fi
  return 1
}

getopts.body:
# Options:
OPTIND=1
while getopts ':${1}' option ; do
  case "${option}" in
    ${2}) ${3}=${4:true}${5:"${OPTARG\}"};;
    ${6:h) echo "$USAGE"; exit;;}
  esac
done
shift "$((OPTIND-1))"

isgui.body:
(which startx || which firefox || which google-chrome || which subl) \
  >/dev/null 2>&1

newscriptds.body:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

# DS - Daily Shells Library
# License:
#   See README.md document in projects page at
#   https://github.com/stroparo/ds

ckds () {
  if [ -z "${DS_VERSION}" ] && ! . "${DS_HOME}/ds.sh" "${DS_HOME}" >/dev/null 2>&1
  then
    echo "No DS Daily Shells loaded. Fix it and call this again." 1>&2
    echo "Tips:" 1>&2
    echo "curl -o - 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/stroparo/ds/master/setup.sh' | bash" 1>&2
    echo "wget -O - 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/stroparo/ds/master/setup.sh' | bash" 1>&2
    return 1
  fi
}
ckds || exit $?

# #############################################################################
# Globals

export PNAME="$(basename "$0")"
export USAGE="
NAME
  ${PNAME} - ${1}

SYNOPSIS
  ${PNAME} ${2}

DESCRIPTION

"

# #############################################################################
# Prep args

# Options:

export DESTDIR=''
export SRCDIR=''

export DRYRUN=false
export EXCLUDE='@@@@EXCLUDEDUMMY@@@@'
export FORCE=false
export INTERACTIVE=false
export QUIET=false
: ${VERBOSE:=false} ; export VERBOSE

OPTIND=1
while getopts ':${3:d:fhinqs:vx:}' opt ; do
  case ${opt} in

    h) echo "${USAGE}" ; exit ;;

    d) export DESTDIR="${OPTARG}";;
    s) export SRCDIR="${OPTARG}";;

    f) export FORCE=true;;
    i) export INTERACTIVE=true;;
    n) export DRYRUN=true;;
    q) export QUIET=true;;
    v) export VERBOSE=true;;
    x) export EXCLUDE="${OPTARG}";;

  esac
done
shift $((OPTIND - 1))

# Arguments:
# VAR="${1}"
# ...

# #############################################################################
# Functions

prep () {

  for i in "$@" ; do
    ${4:# TODO Process each argument in "${i\}"}
  done
}

${5:main} () {

  ${6:# TODO implement}
}

# #############################################################################
# Main

prep "$@"
${5:main} "$@"
exit "$?"

setvardlprog.body:
# Setup the downloader program (curl/wget)
if which curl >/dev/null 2>&1 ; then
  export DLPROG=curl
  export DLOPT='-LSfs'
  export DLOUT='-o'
elif which wget >/dev/null 2>&1 ; then
  export DLPROG=wget
  export DLOPT=''
  export DLOUT='-O'
else
  echo "FATAL: curl and wget missing" 1>&2
  exit 1
fi

setvarinstprog.body:
# System installers
export APTPROG=apt-get; which apt >/dev/null 2>&1 && export APTPROG=apt
export RPMPROG=yum; which dnf >/dev/null 2>&1 && export RPMPROG=dnf
export RPMGROUP="yum groupinstall"; which dnf >/dev/null 2>&1 && export RPMGROUP="dnf group install"
export INSTPROG="$APTPROG"; which "$RPMPROG" >/dev/null 2>&1 && export INSTPROG="$RPMPROG"
